com.codecool.shop.dao

Interface ShoppingCartDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShoppingCartDaoJDBC, ShoppingCartDaoMem

    public interface ShoppingCartDao

    This interface is used for establishing the methods, that the implementation classes have to implement

    This interface is extended by both ShoppingCartDaoMem and ShoppingCartDaoJDBC, they are doing the same thing, providing data to the application, Mem uses the memory, JDBC uses a database for storing data.
    Since:
    2017-05-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Majoross Daniel, Racz Anna, Adam Kovacs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(LineItem item)
      This method is used to add a product through a LineItem object to the database/Memory
      void changeAmount(LineItem item, int num)
      This method is used to increase a decrease a LineItems quantity in the shopping cart.
      LineItem find(int id)
      This method is used to find a LineItem and return it by its ID, in the database
      java.util.List<LineItem> getAll()
      This method can be used the get all LineItems from the database, that are in the shopping cart.
      java.lang.String getTotal()
      Used for getting the total price of all products in the shopping cart.
      void remove(LineItem item)
      This method is used to remove a LineItem from the database.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(LineItem item)
        This method is used to add a product through a LineItem object to the database/Memory
        Parameters:
        item - An object to be added to the shoppingCart built from a product object and quantity attributes.

      • remove

        void remove(LineItem item)
        This method is used to remove a LineItem from the database.
        Parameters:
        item - The LineItem object to be removed.

      • find

        LineItem find(int id)
        This method is used to find a LineItem and return it by its ID, in the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the LineItem to be found.
        Returns:
        Returning the found LineItem object.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<LineItem> getAll()
        This method can be used the get all LineItems from the database, that are in the shopping cart.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of all the LineItem objects that are in the shopping cart.

      • getTotal

        java.lang.String getTotal()
        Used for getting the total price of all products in the shopping cart.
        Returns:
        returns the total price of the LineItems as String.

      • changeAmount

        void changeAmount(LineItem item,
                  int num)
        This method is used to increase a decrease a LineItems quantity in the shopping cart. When we add an item multiple times, only its quantity will increase, no duplicate objects will be added.
        Parameters:
        item - Target LineItem to be manipulated.
        num - The ammount quantity have the be changed by.
